Source   Edit  

Lib/math

Wrapper around Lib/n_math, and raises exceptions when math error occurs as CPython behaves.

Imports

../version, collections/abc, ../builtins/list_decl, n_math, math_impl/err, math_impl/errnoUtils, math_impl/vec_op/niter_types

func cbrt[F: SomeFloat](x: F): F
Admonition: since Python 3.11

Example:

template chk =
  assert cbrt(-1.0) == -1.0
chk()
static: chk()
